short_description: dotty's teahouse is a coffee & tea shop based in carshalton, united kingdom.
long_description: where old traditions are held dear and quality ingredients are guaranteed to create a beautifully fresh, luxury afternoon tea experience to remember!. or swing by and grab some treats from our abundant cake counter – there's always something there to tempt you. check out our macarons and lunch boxes to go. available to eat in, takeaway, collect and local delivery. we don't believe in half measures at dotty's and take every step to provide our lovely customers the best loose leaf tea available, sourced from local suppliers. our cakes are second to none and we believe everyone deserves a slice of happiness – gluten and vegan friendly options mean no one misses out.
generated_description: dotty's teahouse is a tea and bakery establishment located on carshalton high street in carshalton, uk. the company offers a variety of baked goods, including custom celebration cakes, and specializes in traditional afternoon teas. dotty's teahouse also provides a range of food options, such as breakfast bowls, vegan wraps, and gluten-free and vegan-friendly items. the establishment has recently been awarded an alcohol license, allowing it to offer brunch with beverages. additionally, dotty's teahouse offers private hire spaces and gift vouchers.
